products.title: Samsung S25 Ultra
products.description: Samsung Galaxy S25 Ultra is the latest flagship smartphone from Samsung. It features a 6.8-inch Super AMOLED display with a resolution of 2400x1080 pixels, and a refresh rate of 120Hz.

products.title: iPhone 16 Pro
products.description: The iPhone 16 Pro is the latest flagship smartphone from Apple. It features a 6.3-inch Super Retina XDR display with a resolution of 2532x1170 pixels, and a refresh rate of 120Hz.
